h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
paragraph_content:
The second bell can be found in Bamboo Grove. Start from the Snake Trail Keepers Shrine and take the stairs up and go across the bridge. 

Follow this path down and past the river until you loop underneath the bridge you just crossed. Stick to the path until you reach the open area with the bamboo, and look for the path straight up ahead. 



Follow the fires again as they curve off slightly to the right, to reach the arena where you'll need to fight Yaoguai Chief Guangmou. 



Once you've beaten Guangmou, take the stairs at the back of the arena up the bell and ring it.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md", within the section "How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area" and the sub-section "Bell 2". The content is presented below:

The second bell can be found in Bamboo Grove. Start from the Snake Trail Keepers Shrine and take the stairs up and go across the bridge. 

Follow this path down and past the river until you loop underneath the bridge you just crossed. Stick to the path until you reach the open area with the bamboo, and look for the path straight up ahead. 



Follow the fires again as they curve off slightly to the right, to reach the arena where you'll need to fight Yaoguai Chief Guangmou. 



Once you've beaten Guangmou, take the stairs at the back of the arena up the bell and ring it.

img_above_text:
Transformation Spells are very powerful, and essentially give you a separate health and might bar to work with. Might will decay fairly quickly over time, and even more if you charge up the transformation’s focus bar to employ special spell attacks. For this particular spell, you’ll be able to use Guangzhi’s spinning light attacks, and charge a heavy attack for his quick dashes. With a full focus bar, you can use Might on spell after dodging to employ his powerful pogo jump attack!
## Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the First Bell
img_below_text:
With Guangzhi defeated, you can look where he was meditating to find a large bell. Interact with the pole to ring the bell. The Keeper will fret over this, but in reality this is the first of three bells you should seek out in Chapter 1 to uncover a major secret!
Be sure to check around the boss arena for pots to break, some **Aged Ginseng** , and another green wisp that flies away while only granting you a small amount of Will.

This scene corresponds to the objective of ringing the first of three bells in Chapter 1 of the game to uncover a secret. The surrounding context suggests this occurs after defeating Guangzhi, with the bell being a key interactive element in progressing the narrative.

h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell
paragraph_content:
As the boss falls, the Keeper will comment on the two fallen Yaoguai Guangmou and Guangzhi. Both monks apparently aided an Elder named Jinchi to burn down the temple and the monk within alive — but that’s not all they share: Just up the sloping stairway path to the left of the way forward, you can find a second large bell that you can ring. Something ominous seems to be responding to the sound of these bells. 



Look for a way forward beyond a small archway to the side of the boss arena, and climb the winding stairs to follow a trail of gold leading to the next Shrine.

This excerpt is taken from the file "Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md", within the section "Bamboo Grove Walkthrough" and the sub-section "Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell". The content is presented below:

As the boss falls, the Keeper will comment on the two fallen Yaoguai Guangmou and Guangzhi. Both monks apparently aided an Elder named Jinchi to burn down the temple and the monk within alive — but that’s not all they share: Just up the sloping stairway path to the left of the way forward, you can find a second large bell that you can ring. Something ominous seems to be responding to the sound of these bells. 



Look for a way forward beyond a small archway to the side of the boss arena, and climb the winding stairs to follow a trail of gold leading to the next Shrine.

img_above_text:
Instead, go to the left and through the small cave to find the final bell. It'll be at the end of the path, where a wolf hangs from the nearby tree.
## How to Enter the Secret Area in Chapter 1
img_below_text:
Once you've rung the three bells, you'll be automatically transported to the Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple. Go up the stairs and there will be a Keeper's Shrine for you to interact with. You can then proceed, where you can take on Elder Jinchi the secret boss of the area.
![Chapter One Secret Area \(9\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9f/Chapter_One_Secret_Area_%289%29.png)
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character standing before a large bell in a forested area. The prompt on the screen instructs the player to press 'E' to ring the bell. This action is part of a sequence to enter the Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple in Chapter 1, where ringing three bells transports the player to a secret area to face the boss, Elder Jinchi.

h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)
h2_title: Unlock and Complete Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple (Chapter 1)
paragraph_content:
To unlock the secret area in Chapter 1, you'll need to ring 3 bells. Doing this will automatically transport you to the hidden area, where you can beat the Chapter's secret boss. 

  1. Ring the bell in the Forest of Wolves near Guangzhi.
  2. Ring the bell in Bamboo Grove near Guangmou
  3. Ring the bell in Bamboo Grove near Whiteclad Noble
  4. Defeat Elder Jinchi
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Ending_(True_Ending).md", within the section "How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)" and the sub-section "Unlock and Complete Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple (Chapter 1)". The content is presented below:

To unlock the secret area in Chapter 1, you'll need to ring 3 bells. Doing this will automatically transport you to the hidden area, where you can beat the Chapter's secret boss. 

  1. Ring the bell in the Forest of Wolves near Guangzhi.
  2. Ring the bell in Bamboo Grove near Guangmou
  3. Ring the bell in Bamboo Grove near Whiteclad Noble
  4. Defeat Elder Jinchi

img_above_text:
## How to Access the Ancient Guanyin Temple
The only way to be transported to this secret area in Chapter 1 is by locating and interacting with three bells found around the Black Wind Mountain region. They can be rung in any order, and ringing the third bell will automatically transport you to the Secret Area, which you can then fast travel to and from as you wish. The three bells are located in the following regions:
img_below_text:
* **Forest of Wolves** \- From the Outside the Forest Shrine, you can head up the left path to a higher road leading to a rope bridge across a stream. Follow the path straight past the bridge to find an optional Yaoguai Chief named Guangzhi who drops the Red Tides Transformation Spell. At the far end of the arena, you’ll find the first bell.
![Wukong Bamboo 32.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/ab/Wukong_Bamboo_32.jpg)

This bell is one of three that must be rung to access the Ancient Guanyin Temple, a secret area in Chapter 1. The image serves as a visual guide to help players locate and interact with the bell as part of the game's progression.

img_above_text:
Once you’ve learned how to evade his projectiles, the rest of the fight will just boil down to chasing him down and stunning him however you can with Immobilize, your Spirit Attack, and other heavy hits. When he falls, you’ll gain Guangmou’s Spirit to add to your collection, allowing you to summon venomous snakes of your own!
## Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell
